content: धनिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धनमादेयत्वेनास्त्यस्य-ठन्] {@--1@} Rich; wealthy. {@--2@} Virtuous. --कः {@--1@} A rich or wealthy man. {@--2@} A money-lender, creditor; दापयेद्धनिकस्यार्थं <ls>Ms. 8. 51</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 55.</ls> {@--3@} A husband. {@--4@} An honest trader. {@--5@} The प्रियंगु tree. --का {@--1@} A virtuous woman. {@--2@} A wife, young woman. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (प्रियंगु).
